scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel watch src/background.js src/popup/index.js src/chat/index.js
scripts.build: rm -rf JXEM/ && parcel build src/chat/index.js --dist-dir JXEM/dist/chat/ && parcel build src/popup/index.js --dist-dir JXEM/dist/popup/ && parcel build src/background.js --dist-dir JXEM/dist/ && cp manifest.json JXEM/manifest.json && cp popup.html JXEM/popup.html && cp -r images/ JXEM/images/
